description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8qop","text":"How to extract genomic DNA from larvae or finclips using the HotSHOT method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"16gic","text":"Prepare the BASE stock solution (50X):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evt6r","text":"  KOH crystals (1.25M final concentration)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahoiv","text":"  of 0.5M EDTA (10 mM final concentration)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34bj4","text":"ddH2O to   total volume","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ctu1","text":"Can be stored at room temperature for up to four years","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"14.03","error":false,"guid":"CCB5905077F411EDAECCB58FE8BEDC7F","id":"93893","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"E8CB333077F411EDAECCB58FE8BEDC7F","id":"93894","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"233879B077F511EDAECCB58FE8BEDC7F","id":"93895","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9a5cf","text":"Prepare the NEUTRALISATION stock solution (50X)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e51c6","text":"  Tris-HCL (2M final concentration), also called Trizma HCl","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dnvud","text":"ddH2O to   total volume","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ahq0j","text":"Can be stored at room temperature for up to four years","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"63.04","error":false,"guid":"60C9578277F511EDA4920A58A9FEAC02","id":"93896","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"60C9589477F511EDA4920A58A9FEAC02","id":"93897","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n5sk","text":"Prepare fresh 1X BASE and 1X NEUTRALISATION solution in nuclease-free H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpa5l","text":"Add   of 1X BASE solution into each well of the plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"caqg3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"D2DE7F50CFC411EDBE6FD1E94FCF088F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19hdi","text":"Seal the plate and place on PCR block     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E0B737B077F511EDAECCB58FE8BEDC7F","id":"51816","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"B2601E9077F511EDAECCB58FE8BEDC7F","id":"83079","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63aq0","text":"Add   of 1x NEUTRALISATION solution into each well of the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"58ur3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"FC8D1F00CFC411EDBE6FD1E94FCF088F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ble4","text":"Note, the extracted DNA concentration is often too high for downstream applications like PCR or KASP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":47,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ahrq","text":"Store at   if you will use the DNA in the next few weeks. Beware, the samples will slowly evaporate from a sealed plate. Alternatively,   for long-term storage. This will also prevent the samples from evaporating.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"55503D9C77F611EDA4920A58A9FEAC02","id":"51818","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"55503E2277F611EDA4920A58A9FEAC02","id":"51819","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

This technique is only possible if you have already loaded the plate with 50µL 1X BASE solution (step 5)","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cpmok","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
